ai.rapids.cudf

Class Aggregation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.rapids.cudf.Aggregation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregationOnColumn

    public abstract class Aggregation
extends Object
    Represents an aggregation operation. Please note that not all aggregations work, or even make since in all types of aggregation operations.

      • onColumn

        public AggregationOnColumn onColumn(int columnIndex)
        Add a column to the Aggregation so it can be used on a specific column of data.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - the index of the column to operate on.

        Max reduction.

      • count

        public static Aggregation count()
        Count number of valid, a.k.a. non-null, elements.

      • count

        @Deprecated
public static Aggregation count(boolean includeNulls)
        Deprecated. 
        Count number of elements. (This is deprecated, use count(NullPolicy nullPolicy) instead)
        Parameters:
        includeNulls - true if nulls should be counted. false if only non-null values should be counted.

      • count

        public static Aggregation count(Aggregation.NullPolicy nullPolicy)
        Count number of elements.
        Parameters:
        nullPolicy - INCLUDE if nulls should be counted. EXCLUDE if only non-null values should be counted.

      • any

        public static Aggregation any()
        Any reduction. Produces a true or 1, depending on the output type, if any of the elements in the range are true or non-zero, otherwise produces a false or 0. Null values are skipped.

      • all

        public static Aggregation all()
        All reduction. Produces true or 1, depending on the output type, if all of the elements in the range are true or non-zero, otherwise produces a false or 0. Null values are skipped.

      • sumOfSquares

        public static Aggregation sumOfSquares()
        Sum of squares reduction.

      • mean

        public static Aggregation mean()
        Arithmetic mean reduction.

      • variance

        public static Aggregation variance()
        Variance aggregation with 1 as the delta degrees of freedom.

      • variance

        public static Aggregation variance(int ddof)
        Variance aggregation.
        Parameters:
        ddof - delta degrees of freedom. The divisor used in calculation of variance is N - ddof, where N is the population size.

      • standardDeviation

        public static Aggregation standardDeviation()
        Standard deviation aggregation with 1 as the delta degrees of freedom.

      • standardDeviation

        public static Aggregation standardDeviation(int ddof)
        Standard deviation aggregation.
        Parameters:
        ddof - delta degrees of freedom. The divisor used in calculation of std is N - ddof, where N is the population size.

      • median

        public static Aggregation median()
        Median reduction.

      • quantile

        public static Aggregation quantile(double... quantiles)
        Aggregate to compute the specified quantiles. Uses linear interpolation by default.

      • quantile

        public static Aggregation quantile(QuantileMethod method,
                                   double... quantiles)
        Aggregate to compute various quantiles.

      • argMax

        public static Aggregation argMax()
        Index of max element. Please note that when using this aggregation with a group by if the data is not already sorted by the grouping keys it may be automatically sorted prior to doing the aggregation. This would result in an index into the sorted data being returned.

      • argMin

        public static Aggregation argMin()
        Index of min element. Please note that when using this aggregation with a group by if the data is not already sorted by the grouping keys it may be automatically sorted prior to doing the aggregation. This would result in an index into the sorted data being returned.

      • nunique

        public static Aggregation nunique()
        Number of unique, non-null, elements.

      • nunique

        @Deprecated
public static Aggregation nunique(boolean includeNulls)
        Deprecated. 
        Number of unique elements. (This is deprecated, use nunique(NullPolicy nullPolicy) instead)
        Parameters:
        includeNulls - true if nulls should be counted else false. If nulls are counted they compare as equal so multiple null values in a range would all only increase the count by 1.

      • nunique

        public static Aggregation nunique(Aggregation.NullPolicy nullPolicy)
        Number of unique elements.
        Parameters:
        nullPolicy - INCLUDE if nulls should be counted else EXCLUDE. If nulls are counted they compare as equal so multiple null values in a range would all only increase the count by 1.

      • nth

        public static Aggregation nth(int offset)
        Get the nth, non-null, element in a group.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to look at. Negative numbers go from the end of the group. Any value outside of the group range results in a null.

      • nth

        @Deprecated
public static Aggregation nth(int offset,
                                          boolean includeNulls)
        Deprecated. 
        Get the nth element in a group. (This is deprecated, use nth(int offset, NullPolicy nullPolicy) instead)
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to look at. Negative numbers go from the end of the group. Any value outside of the group range results in a null.
        includeNulls - true if nulls should be included in the aggregation or false if they should be skipped.

      • nth

        public static Aggregation nth(int offset,
                              Aggregation.NullPolicy nullPolicy)
        Get the nth element in a group.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to look at. Negative numbers go from the end of the group. Any value outside of the group range results in a null.
        nullPolicy - INCLUDE if nulls should be included in the aggregation or EXCLUDE if they should be skipped.

      • rowNumber

        public static Aggregation rowNumber()
        Get the row number, only makes since for a window operations.

      • collect

        public static Aggregation collect()
        Collect the values into a list. nulls will be skipped.

      • collect

        public static Aggregation collect(Aggregation.NullPolicy nullPolicy)
        Collect the values into a list.
        Parameters:
        nullPolicy - INCLUDE if nulls should be included in the aggregation or EXCLUDE if they should be skipped.

      • lead

        public static Aggregation lead(int offset)
        In a rolling window return the value offset entries ahead or null if it is outside of the window.

      • lead

        public static Aggregation lead(int offset,
                               ColumnVector defaultOutput)
        In a rolling window return the value offset entries ahead or the corresponding value from defaultOutput if it is outside of the window. Note that this does not take any ownership of defaultOutput and the caller mush ensure that defaultOutput remains valid during the life time of this aggregation operation.

      • lag

        public static Aggregation lag(int offset)
        In a rolling window return the value offset entries behind or null if it is outside of the window.

      • lag

        public static Aggregation lag(int offset,
                              ColumnVector defaultOutput)
        In a rolling window return the value offset entries behind or the corresponding value from defaultOutput if it is outside of the window. Note that this does not take any ownership of defaultOutput and the caller mush ensure that defaultOutput remains valid during the life time of this aggregation operation.
